subanswer.text: The total number of seats is unknown, but we know one-fourth of these seats were taken by administrators and one-third of the remaining seats were taken by parents. So the number of seats taken by parents is (3/4)x(1/3) = x/12. This means the total number of seats available for students is x - 1/4x - x/12 = (11/12)x. The answer is (11/12)*x.
